content: **king george socks** by twinset & purl inspired by the bridgerton spin off queen charlotte i designed the king george using a twisted stitch pattern called wheat using this stitch pattern seemed apt for farmer george the twisted stitches can be worked without a cable needle as described in the special stitches box **join in our bridgerton sock-a-long from nov 1st to decrease 31st 2023 visit our ravelry group for more info twinset & purl knitting podcast ravelry group** **pattern information** **sizes ** 1 adult m 64 sts / 2 adult l 72 sts to fit approximately 8-inch 20 cm /9-inch 22 5 cm foot circumference **yarn ** malabrigo ultimate sock 75% sw merino wool/25% nylon 100g/425m 464yds in the caramel colour way **needles ** 2 5 mm / us 1 5 or size needed to get gauge **gauge ** 8 sts & 12 rounds = 1 inch / 2 5 cm in stocking stitch
